glsa.title: libupnp: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: Multiple buffer overflow flaws in libupnp may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libupnp is a portable, open source, UPnP development kit.

description.p: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities have been discovered in libupnp. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libupnp users should upgrade to the latest version:
